sentences.english: Conclusion Myofibroblast is the main cause to result in scar contracture of bilioenteric anastomosis.
sentences.chinese: 是导致胆肠吻合口瘢痕性挛缩的主要原因。

sentences.english: Methods The hypertrophic scar fibroblasts were cultured with tissue culture method.
sentences.chinese: 方法用组织块法培养人瘢痕成纤维细胞。

sentences.english: The upper eyelid scar was repaired by concealing it in the supratarsal fold naturally.
sentences.chinese: 修复上睑瘢痕，使瘢痕自然隐蔽在上睑皱襞中。

sentences.english: The upper eyelid scar was repaired by concealing it in the supratarsal fold naturally.
sentences.chinese: 修复上睑瘢痕，使瘢痕自然隐蔽在上睑皱襞中。

sentences.english: Liver scars also provide an ideal environment for the development of cancers.
sentences.chinese: 肝脏瘢痕还为肝脏肿瘤的发展提供了理想的环境。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment of axillary deformity caused by post-burn cicatricial contracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腋部瘢痕挛缩的防治方法。

sentences.english: More than 2 cases of maternal uterine scar due to reasons outside the cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 余2例产妇因瘢痕子宫外的原因而进行剖宫产术。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of curing scaring ectropion by transplanting dissociate skin petal.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨游离皮瓣移植治疗瘢痕性睑外翻的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To search the surgical methods of esophageal carcinoma complicated with cicatricial pyloric obstruction .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨食管癌合并瘢痕性幽门梗阻的手术方法。

sentences.english: The prevalence of scar contractures in the upper extremities was similar to that in the lower extremities.
sentences.chinese: 瘢痕挛缩的发生率在上下肢中相差无几。

sentences.english: Before applying Mepiform make sure the scar area and surrounding skin are clean and dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用前瘢痕和周围的皮肤要洗净擦干。

sentences.english: Conclusion Transplanting dissociate skin petal is effective for scaring ectropion.
sentences.chinese: 结论耳后游离皮瓣移植治疗瘢痕性睑外翻效果良好。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of the fetal scare-less wound healing(FSWH)in rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胎兔皮肤伤口无瘢痕愈合机理。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in incision scar and lower eyelid ectropion .
sentences.chinese: 两组在切口瘢痕方面无明显差别，均无下睑外翻。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the appropriate labor modalities for secondary pregnancy of women with cicatricial uterus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨瘢痕子宫再次妊娠的分娩方式。

sentences.english: If Shenshu can be applied to blister or scar moxibustion moxibustion has better curative effect.
sentences.chinese: 若肾俞能施发疱灸或瘢痕灸，则疗效更好。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
